This app demonstrates several key aspects:

1. Uses `remove_accordion_panel` in Shiny Express mode
2. Creates a synthetic dictionary of panel data
3. Dynamically removes panels when the button is clicked
4. Updates the button label and state based on remaining panels
5. Shows a notification when no panels are left
6. Follows Shiny for Python best practices

Key features:
- Uses `ui.accordion()` with `id` parameter
- Leverages `@reactive.effect` and `@reactive.event`
- Demonstrates dynamic UI updates
- Uses `ui.remove_accordion_panel()` to remove panels
- Uses `ui.update_action_button()` to modify button state

The app will start with 5 accordion panels, and each click of the "Remove Last Panel" button will remove a panel until none are left.
